field.name: HorizontalPosP
field.description: Proportional coefficient for desired horizontal speed in relation to altitude displacement

field.name: VerticalPosP
field.description: Proportional coefficient for desired vertical speed in relation to altitude displacement

field.name: BearingPI
field.description: Coefficients for desired bank angle in relation to ground bearing error - this controls heading

field.name: PowerPI
field.description: Coefficients for desired pitch in relation to relative speed sensor (IASerror/IASactual)

field.name: VerticalToPitchCrossFeed
field.description: Coefficients for adjusting desired pitch in relation to "vertical speed error relative to airspeed" (verror/IASactual)

field.name: AirspeedToVerticalCrossFeed
field.description: Proportional coefficients for adjusting vertical speed error for power calculation in relation to relative airspeed error (IASerror/IASactual)

field.name: SpeedPI
field.description: Proportional coefficients for desired throttle in relation to vertical speed error (absolute but including crossfeed)

field.name: RollLimit
field.description: Maximum allowed bank angles in navigated flight

field.name: PitchLimit
field.description: Maximum allowed pitch angles and setpoint for neutral pitch

field.name: ThrottleLimit
field.description: Minimum and maximum allowed throttle and setpoint for cruise speed

field.name: OrbitRadius
field.description: The default radius to use for PH and RTH
